results.title: Progressive Supranuclear Palsy and Statin Use.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Univariate models showed lower @<m>DISEASE_Supranuclear_Palsy_Progressive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013494 @@@PSP@@@ risk for type 1 statin users (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@).

citations.NLM: Bayram E, Marras C, Standaert DG, Kluger BM, Bordelon YM, Shprecher DR, Litvan I, ENGENE-PSP Consortium. Progressive Supranuclear Palsy and Statin Use. Mov Disord. 2020 Jul;35(7):1253-1257. PMID: 32220093
